products.title: Stirlo Olive Green
products.metadescription: Made to measure stirlo olive green roller blind | privacy, dim-out fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirloolive green plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion.

products.title: Burst Electric Lime Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Buy your new green roller blind, made to measure and with a 4-year guarantee on all blinds. Free samples available and all blinds are bespoke to your size.
products.productdescription: The green colour of the burst electric lime is best suited to rooms with neutral tones so as to make the most of this colour. Ideal places for this colour blind would be in the kitchen or in a bathroom to add some colour and vibrancy to the room. As a dimout blind, this is a great fabric for filtering the light entering your room and stopping any annoying glare on your living room tv.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. These blinds are moisture resistant too so can be installed in a kitchen or bathroom. Fed up of the sun spoiling your view of the telly? Install this dimout blind and stop the glare from ruinning your favourite show.  All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Sea Green - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Trinity (blackout), sea green - roller blind take one look at trinity blackout in sea green, and what do you see? To us it's an electric infusion that allows you to take your mind back to those days spent by the coast. The sun, the sea, and the clear blue
products.productdescription: Take one look at trinity blackout in sea green, and what do you see? To us it's an electric infusion that allows you to take your mind back to those days spent by the coast. The sun, the sea, and the clear blue sky all come to mind, and yet sea green still offers something more.Matching to sea green is something you may feel is a subtle art given how striking it is, but that just means you might be overthinking things. It's a colour that needs to be celebrated, so consider making your windows the centrepiece the living room has been waiting for.

products.productdescription: There's no getting away from it, the roma's lime is a bright, fun, in-your-face kind of colour. And when trying to make a statement, that's no bad thing! If you're feeling adventurous, or just want to give your dcor a little jumpstart, this could be the window covering for you. As long as you're looking for colour and vibrancy, we can't think of a room this blind won't work in! We particularly love it in a kitchen or dining room. Kids will love it too, so pair with other brights in their playroom or bedroom.

products.title: Linden Sage Green Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Linden sage green roller blind
products.productdescription: The linden green roller blind is perfect if you want to bring a sense of nature into your home. The subtle, sage green colour combined with the leafy pattern makes this blind ideal for creating a more earthy interior and will look great in any window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.  All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Pot Plants PVC Matte Greenhouse Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Pot plants pvc matte greenhouse roller blind in white/green/multicoloured. Made to measure from 20.20 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
For the inner botanist in us all, their pot plants greenhouse pvc-coated blind features lush foliage, soft succulents and delicate ferns in a flattering green colour scheme. Made from wipeable pvc-coated fabric, this bright and cheery roller blind adds a splash of vitality and colour to your home. 
 
Available in a layer-loving roman blind or luscious curtain! 
 
At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this roller blind comes with their free five year guarantee and customer-first service.

At swift direct blinds, their modern, electric roller blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with their high quality products, that this roller blind is covered with their free 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in their blinds.

products.productdescription:
Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style both inside and outside your home.
